overview: An unusual resemblance between Tovi, the Limon's anciant dog, and Guri, a dog starring an old israeli picture book named "Nurit and Guri", leads the family to try and trace Guri's owner - the girl from the book, Nurit. 2nd place winner of high-school contest in DocAviv 2020 Festival.
tagline: People don't get it. Dogs do.
title: Finding Guri
